feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:51 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 7:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Fog. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
